item.title: このページについて
item.description: このページについて Nakad@NakadEngineerのTechメモとして記録しています。 About Nakad Fullname : Daisuke Nakata Origin : Tsubata,Ishikawa,Japan Current Residence : Funabashi,Chiba Age : 25 Skills : OS : WindowsServer 2012R2 / 2016 Amazon Linux2 Ubuntu 14.04-18.0x CentOS 6⁄7 VMWare ESXi Networking : Cisco/YAMAHA L2/L3 Internal Routing and Switching AWS : EC2/VPC/S3/IAM/Cloudformation/SSM/Cloudwatch/etc… Shell : Windows Powershell v3.0-5.0 Powershell Core Bash WSLBash Unit Test : Pester Others : Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (CitrixXD) Active Directory Azure Active Directory Microsoft Intune (MDM) SCVMM vCenter Microsoft Hyper-V DevTools : Editor : Visual Studio Code Terminal : VSCode/Rlogin License : LinuC Lv2(LPIC Lv2) AWS SAA 基本情報技術者 Oracle Java Bronze CCENT (expired…) Now learning Terraform for AWS Ansible Kubernetes/Container Polaris(Powershell Web Framework) Work Experience Japan Digital Design (2018 Sep - Present) in Tokyo,Japan Infra & Internal System Engineer AsiaQuest (2016 Apr - 2017 Dec) in Tokyo,Japan Infrastructure Engineer
